Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Atmosphere Regulator^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Excellent, and the one I ordered is already on the way. There we go. As promised, ^green;a ton of money.^green;

I need to ^green;borrow^reset; an ^orange;Atmospheric Regulator^reset; so I can colonize a hostile world. You'll find it at your ^orange;Power Station^reset;. I'll need to keep it for a while but I'll pay top dollar for it.
